title: This Is Player to Riot Support (FPS)
body:
I would like at the bare minimum an acknowledgment from Riot that they have seen the numerous posts about FPS problems and that they are looking into it. 
It is upsetting that so many people have claimed similar problems, been through Riot Support tickets and the problems persist. Can we at least get a Riot employee to make an enquiry post so we can maybe narrow down the culprit of this bug?

replies.body:
I'm not aware of anything specific, or some kind of widespread fps issue.  We're regularly having patches and a lot of players are updating to the new client, so it's possible that some game files are getting corrupt along the way.  There could also be driver or specific video card issues too, but I don't really know for sure.  This is why we regularly ask players to go through the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help rule out possibilities.  If there is something major going on, sending in those [tickets](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to us are super important for tracking emerging issues.  

FPS and connection issues are pretty common, so hit us up in a ticket and we'll see if there's more to it.  Thanks for your post!

With all due respect, if you believe that this is not a "known" and "popular" issue that many are having, then clearly you have not been active on these forums in the past two weeks let alone past few days. There are more than a dozen threads discussing this specific issue in detail. If I have to gather links for each thread on this specific issue then I can. But to say this is an isolated incident, or riot isn't aware of this problem regarding the new client and fps loss, would be the furthest thing from the truth.
